Paul's Journal

niagara is fast.

Colm has an awesomr article on benchmarking the Sun Niagara vs ftp.heatnet.ie.

The real disappointment is that the Event MPM and Solaris Event Ports can still panic the kernel. I have only experenced this bug since before Solaris 10 went GA. Maybe Sun will fix it soon.
